itunes:title: #287 - Intentions for Small Business Success at Every Level with Kali Edwards
title: #287 - Intentions for Small Business Success at Every Level with Kali Edwards
description:
One of the best things about running a business is that you get to choose what success means for you. In this episode, Emily Thompson of Being Boss talks with web designer Kali Edwards about the benefits of intentionally keeping business small. Kali shares her experience in building a small business, staying true to herself in what she offers, and overcoming the comparison trap to “make it big”. Together they explore how redefining intentions for business can create a holistic work/life balance.

Get full shownotes for this episode here >>
